mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into comment( comment, b_seq, m_id, m_name ) values( #{comment}, #{b_seq}, #{m_id}, #{m_name} )
mapper.select: select c.* from comment as c inner join board as b on c.b_seq = #{b_seq} = b.seq
